Powers.Name: Bullet
Powers.String: local Created, Creator, General = ... local Center, Point, v = Creator.Translation, {Creator.Transformated.data[0], Creator.Transformated.data[1], Creator.Transformated.data[2]}, Created.Objects[1] v.MMcalc = true v.Speed = General.Library.PointAToB(Center, Point) for i=1,3 do v.Speed[i] = v.Speed[i] / 30 v.Rotation[i] = Creator.Rotation[i] v.Translation[i] = Center[i] end v.Rotation[4] = Creator.Rotation[4]

Powers.Name: Asteroid
Powers.String: local Created, Creator, General = ... local Center, v = Creator.Translation, Created.Objects[1] v.MMcalc = true for i=1,3 do if math.random(1, 2) == 1 then v.Translation[i] = Center[i] + math.random(30, 50) else v.Translation[i] = Creator.Translation[i] - math.random(30, 50) end end local c1, c2 = Creator.Translation, v.Translation local Move = General.Library.PointAToB(c2, c1) for i=1,3 do v.Speed[i] = Move[i]/10000 v.RotationSpeed[i] = math.random()/100 end
